channel.title: Requesting veracs for kq guide
channel.description: i was wondering if some one could make or direct me to a guide that only lets you fight or go to kq with veracs on

item.title: Requesting veracs for kq guide
item.dc:creator: @veikron veikron
item.description:
@veikron wrote:

    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("wc")) {
        if (teleblock == true) {
            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar
        } else {
            teleportToX = 2544;
            teleportToY = 3878;
            sendMessage("Grab Axe And Start Cutting Trees.");
        }
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kqueen")) {
        if (teleblock == true) {
            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar
        } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 && playerEquipment[playerBody] == 4757 && playerEquipment[playerHats] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4759) {
            teleportToX = 3485;
            teleportToY = 9483;
            sendMessage("You teleport to the kalphite area.");
        } else {
           sendMessage("You need to be wearing full veracs to fight the queen.");
       }
    } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("cather")) {
        if (teleblock == true) {
            sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar[code][/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 07:04:13 pm[/size][hr]lol woops il redo sory guys

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“wc”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Mod Allstar
} else {
teleportToX = 2544;
teleportToY = 3878;
sendMessage(“Grab Axe And Start Cutting Trees.”);
}
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“kqueen”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Mod Allstar
} else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 && playerEquipment[playerBody] == 4757 && playerEquipment[playerHats] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4759) {
teleportToX = 3485;
teleportToY = 9483;
sendMessage(“You teleport to the kalphite area.”);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need to be wearing full veracs to fight the queen.”);
}
} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“cather”)) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); // made by Mod Allstar[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2008, 08:02:22 pm[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Requesting veracs for kq guide

item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

try this

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("kqueen")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Mod Allstar } else if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 && playerEquipment[playerBody] == 4757 && playerEquipment[playerHats] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4759) { teleportToX = 3485; teleportToY = 9483; sendMessage("You teleport to the kalphite area."); } else { sendMessage("You need to be wearing full veracs to fight the queen."); } } }

item.title: Requesting veracs for kq guide

item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

you could always put something like this on your tele command

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 && playerEquipment[playerBody] == 4757 && playerEquipment[playerHats] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4759) { teleportToX = xcoord; teleportToY = ycoord; sendMessage("blah blah."); } else { sendMessage("You need full veracs to fight the queen."); }
